name: google-sheets-writer
description: A Mosaia tool that writes summaries or data to a Google Sheet.

scripts.test:request: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/write -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"sheet_id\": \"1efj3u3zsHzFfVAvQAySjIemJpHtbsqBvLg3rXCUUpjE\", \"range\": \"Sheet1!A1\", \"summary\": \"This is a test summary written by the Mosaia tool.\"}"
